column4: ed/I came back to tell you that ubuntu 8.10 seems not to able to run audigy2.
ed1/I've just read that one of local ubuntu user  is complaining ubuntu 8.04 could but 8.10 cannot run audigy 2.  It's not your problem but ubuntu its own problem.
so there's no fix for it?
i just tried reloading drivers and i got sound temporarily
